reviews.review_msg: Kind, genuine, and clear prof. Assignmentsexaminations are fair, you just have to put in the work. Presentation style is not the most exciting, but you'll certainly learn a lot from this course. Ignore the slides, they do you no good, with exception to the maps. Take thorough notes, the details come in handy.

loved the course. great textbook. readings were not that bad, about 1 chapter a week. 2 papers. the last paper is your final.  interesting lectures, informative lectures.  a good class to take if you like writing and arnt too bad at it.
